Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by New York (N) in 1965...
Traded from New York (N) to Pittsburgh on 1/31/1968 (Going to PIT: C J. Bench, LF S. Braun, P R. Klimkowski, P B. Moose, P G. Nolan. Going to NYM: LF W. Stargell, P B. Veale)...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1969, off Cecil Upshaw (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/20/1969, off Sandy Koufax (PHI)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Los Angeles on 4/11/1970...
Injured on 9/19/1970 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1975, hitting .450 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 5/5/1978 to a 1-year deal worth $760,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/1/1979 to a 2-year deal worth $2,540,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/6/1981 to a 4-year deal worth $2,750,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (A) on 10/3/1981...
Traded from Boston to Minnesota on 7/21/1983 (Going to MIN: C J. Bench. Going to BOS: LF D. Pasqua)...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 9/26/1983...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 5/5/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $944,000 per year...
Drafted in 4th round, 77th overall pick, by Detroit in 1987...
Injured on 8/9/1987 with a Bruised Ulna, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/22/1989 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/7/1993 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 6 days...
Injured on 8/15/1995 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Injured on 4/6/1996 with a Bruised Foot, out for 5 days...
Injured on 4/1/1997 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
